reviews.text: The titanium design is absolutely stunning and feels premium in hand. The camera system is incredible, especially the 5x zoom.
Great performance with the A17 Pro chip, but the battery life could be better. Still worth the upgrade from iPhone 13.
Expensive but the Action Button and USB-C are game changers. The display is gorgeous.
Good phone but not much different from iPhone 14 Pro. The price increase is hard to justify.
Battery drains too fast and the phone gets hot during gaming. Expected better for this price.
The S Pen integration is fantastic and the camera system is top-notch. The AI features are impressive.
Excellent battery life and the display is incredible. The titanium frame feels premium.
Great phone but One UI could be more polished. The fingerprint sensor is sometimes unreliable.
The AI features are gimmicky and the phone is too expensive. Good hardware though.
Fingerprint sensor is unreliable and the phone is too heavy. Not worth the premium price.
Incredible performance for video editing and 3D rendering. The battery life is amazing for this power.
Perfect for professional work. The M3 Max chip handles everything I throw at it without breaking a sweat.
Expensive but worth every penny for creative professionals. The display is stunning.
Great performance but the lack of ports is annoying. Need to carry dongles everywhere.
Not many ports and the price is steep. Good performance but overkill for most users.
Best noise cancellation I've ever experienced. Perfect for flights and commuting.
Amazing sound quality and the battery life is incredible. Worth the premium price.
Comfortable for long hours of wear. The touch controls are intuitive and responsive.
Great sound but the touch controls can be finicky. Sometimes activates when adjusting the headphones.
Touch controls are too sensitive and the case is too big. Good sound quality though.
The OLED screen is beautiful and the battery life is much better than the original Switch.
Perfect for both handheld and docked gaming. The improved kickstand is great for tabletop mode.
Great console but the Joy-Con drift issue is still present. Nintendo should fix this.
Good upgrade from the original Switch but not essential if you already have one.
Joy-Con drift is still a problem and the online service is overpriced for what you get.
